price: Suka ce: "Ã'a, ku ne bãbu marãba a gare ku, kũ ne kuka gabãtar da shi a gare mu." To, matabbatar tã mũnana (ita wutar).
arabic: قَالُواْ بَلۡ أَنتُمۡ لَا مَرۡحَبَۢا بِكُمۡۖ أَنتُمۡ قَدَّمۡتُمُوهُ لَنَاۖ فَبِئۡسَ ٱلۡقَرَارُ

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: qālū bal antum lā marḥaban bikum antum qaddamtumūhu lanā fabi'sa al-qarāru
